name: Strawberry Quinoa Salad
author: Genevieve Le Roux
summary: This strawberry, lemon, spinach, feta, and quinoa salad is fresh, sweet, and filling. (Can be adapted to your favorites) You can adjust quantities to how much it looks like you need, or how much you would like, also add nuts if you want to.
ingredients: 2 cups baby spinach, or to taste
½ cup thinly sliced strawberries, or to taste
directions: Pour 2 cups water over quinoa; bring to a boil
Simmer until quinoa is tender, 12 to 15 minutes
Combine lemon juice and olive oil in a small bowl; stir until dressing is combined
Pour half of the quinoa into a large salad bowl
Add 1 handful of baby spinach; stir together
Add 1 handful of walnuts, feta cheese, and strawberries; stir until mixed
Repeat layering and stirring quinoa, spinach, feta cheese, and strawberries until all ingredients are mixed together
